amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to add the Under Secretary of Homeland Security for Intelligence and Analysis into the report on possible exploitation of virtual currencies by terrorist actors and requires the reports dissemination to state and local law enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rice (NY) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rice (NY) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Miss Rice (NY).
